leaflet.candidateName: Jasper Gerard and Cllr Dave Naghi

messages.title: A record of delivery and promise of more
messages.content: On 7th May, the residents of East Ward will vote for their MP and their local councillor. In this tight race, it is a choice between Lib Dem and Conservative candidates.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In this tight race, it is a choice between Lib Dem and Conservative candidates.

issues.governance: Jasper, Dave and the Lib Dem team work all year round for residents, not just at elections.

housing.content: The Lib Dems are fighting against Tory plans to allow thousands of houses to be built in the borough.

endorsements.endorsement: I know the Liberal Democrats are fighting Conservative house building plans, that's why I'm voting for them.
I want a hardworking MP who cares about their constituency. That's why I'm voting for Jasper.

images.caption: Jasper Gerard and Cllr Dave Naghi

leaflet.additionalNotes: Elect a hardworking local MP on 7th May.
